capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he's definitely one of the tallest people in the school. I mean, he towers over most of our professors, let alone students! The way he moves around the castle is almost comical because of his height - it's like he's trying not to bump into anything.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. valeria, i have to say, i've never heard of anyone being called "surprisingly tall" before   that's a new one! tell me more about this title.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he's definitely one of the tallest people in the Hogwarts staff. I mean, he towers over most of the professors, doesn't he?
capsules_submitted.reply: that rings a bell. valeria told me that hagrid is quite tall.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid, and I have to say, he's really tall. I mean, it's not every day you see someone who's over 6 feet 9 inches standing in front of you. The way he moves with such ease, despite his size, is quite impressive.
capsules_submitted.reply: i know. valeria told me that hagrid is quite tall.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he does look pretty tall for a gamekeeper. I mean, the guy's got to be able to reach those high shelves in the greenhouses without using a stool! Hagrid looks surprisingly-tall
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he does look pretty tall for someone who's supposed to be teaching Care of Magical Creatures.
capsules_submitted.reply: that rings a bell. valeria told me that hagrid is quite tall.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he does look pretty tall for a gamekeeper. I mean, the guy's got to be able to reach those high shelves in the greenhouses without using a stool!
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is the typical gender associated with someone who works with magical creatures?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid's gender is indeed male. I've always found it interesting how J.K. Rowling chose to make him a half-giant, and his masculinity has been an important aspect of his character throughout the series.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is the attribute that hagrid possesses?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid does look like he's got a lot of beards going on. I mean, have you seen him lately? He's always sporting some kind of facial hair, it seems like.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is the attribute that hagrid possesses?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid's beard grow over the years, and I can confidently say he's always been quite the rugged-looking guy.
